definition: Potsdam conference, July-August 1945, between Truman, Stalin and British prime ministers Churchill and Attlee
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
